name: Possessive (CodingRooster)
description:
Take control of a mysterious entity within an old, (sorta) sprawling dungeon! You have the ability to control keys in order to progress, but be careful! Others in the dungeon are able to do the same! Try not to lose control of the situation while progressing through the dungeon to win!

CONTROLS & INFORMATION (Read before playing!):

W, A, S, D to move.

Bump into a key to take control of it, and guide it to a locked area to unlock it.

If an enemy bumps into you or you get hit by a projectile, you and the enemy will swap control! Take advantage of the situation by ramming your new body into nearby spikes to kill the enemy, or else they will do the same to you.

The player's health bar is on the top left of the screen. When controlling an enemy, it's health bar is shown on the top right of the screen.

This is a submission for the 2020 GMTK Game Jam! The theme for this Jam was "Out of Control."
